Authors and Citation

Authors

  • Lila Ballav Bhusal. Author, maintainer.

  • Alessandro Borin. Contributor.
    Methodology: Borin and Mancini (2023); Borin, Mancini and Taglioni (2025)

  • Michele Mancini. Contributor.
    Methodology: Borin and Mancini (2023); Borin, Mancini and Taglioni (2025)

  • Daria Taglioni. Contributor.
    Methodology: Borin, Mancini and Taglioni (2025)
